rooms.name: entrance_hallway
rooms.description: A spacious entry area with Scandinavian minimalist design and neutral color palette.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: Expansive living space featuring large windows for ample natural light and a view of the central courtyard, adhering to Vastu by positioning the main entrance appropriately.

rooms.name: home_theater
rooms.description: Private entertainment area designed with soundproof walls and integrated multimedia system. The placement follows Vastu guidelines by avoiding the north-east direction for screens.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, functional kitchen with Scandinavian design aesthetics. Includes ample storage and a breakfast nook facing the courtyard.

rooms.name: master_bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a view of the central courtyard. Includes built-in wardrobes and ample natural light, designed keeping Vastu principles in mind.

rooms.name: bathroom
rooms.description: Well-designed bathroom complementing the master bedroom with Scandinavian fixtures and efficient layout.

rooms.name: central_courtyard
rooms.description: An open courtyard acting as the central feature of the design, promoting natural ventilation and connection with nature. The layout respects local building norms and Vastu by ensuring proper alignment.

openings.description: Main entrance with a vestibule leading to the entrance_hallway, aligning with Vastu by avoiding direct wind flow.
Large windows providing ample natural light to the living_room and master_bedroom while maintaining privacy.
Balcony adjoining the kitchen offering views of the courtyard, designed for both aesthetic appeal and functional use.
